Articles.Content:
Mechjeb not working, uppon start up of the game, i get the following error message: ''Incorrect Mechjeb2 Installation. Mechjeb2 has been installed incorrectly and will not function properly. All mechjeb2 should be located in KSP like this. <ksp> Gamedata, Mechjeb2, Parts,Pluggins. Do not move any files from the mechjeb2 folder. Incorrect Path: plugins\mechjeb2.dll.'' </ksp>

ASAP help would be real nice ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> > Mechjeb not working, uppon start up of the game, i get the following error message: ''Incorrect Mechjeb2 Installation. Mechjeb2 has been installed incorrectly and will not function properly. All mechjeb2 should be located in KSP like this. Gamedata, Mechjeb2, Parts,Pluggins. Do not move any files from the mechjeb2 folder. Incorrect Path: plugins\mechjeb2.dll.''

ASAP help would be real nice

I just now had the same problem. I am sure you have found the solution by now but for everyone who has the same problem: Copy the mechjeb folder directly into the game data folder, not squad! And then delete the mechjeb content from squad/parts and squad/plugins. That should do the trick.
